citation.article-title: 16S ribosomal ribonucleic acid sequence analyses of lactococci and related taxa. Description of Vagococcus fluvialis gen. nov., sp. nov.

p.s: Description of Vagococcus fluvialis sp. nov.
Vagococcus fluvialis (flu. vi. alis. L. adj. fluvialis belonging to a river)
Cells are ovoid, elongated in the direction of the chain, occurring singly, in pairs or in short chains.
Cells are motile by peritrichous flagella.
Grow at 10° and 40°C, in 4% NaCl and in 0.1% methylene blue milk.
Does not grow at 45°C, in 6.5% NaCl or at pH 9.6.
Does not survive heating at 60°C for 30 min.
Acid is produced from amygdalin, arbutin, cellobiose, β-gentiobiose, glucose, fructose, maltose, mannitol, mannose, N-acetylglucosamine, ribose, salicin and trehalose.
Some strains produce acid from glycerol, α-methyl-D-glucoside, sorbitol, sucrose and D-turanose.

Acid is not produced from adonitol, arabitol, D-arabinose, L-arabinose, 2-ketogluconate, 5-ketogluconate, dulcitol, erythritol, D-fucose, L-fucose, galactose, glycogen, inulin, inositol, lactose, D-lyxose, melibiose, rhamnose, L-sorbose, starch, D-tagatose, D-xylose, L-xylose, xylitol, α-methyl-D-mannoside and β-methylxyloside.
Aesculin is hydrolysed.
Hippurate and gelatin are not hydrolysed.
Some strains produce arginine dehydrolase, β-galactosidase and pyrrolidonylarylmidase.
Alkaline phosphatase, α-galactosidase, β-glucuronidase and leucine arylamidase are not produced.
Voges-Proskauer negative.
Reacts with Lancefield serological group N antiserum.
The cell wall peptidoglycan type is LYS-D-ASP.
Contains poly (glycerophosphate) lipoteichoic acids solely substituted with D-alanine ester.
The major glycolipid is Gal (α 1-2) Glc (α 1-3) acyl, Gro.
Long chain fatty acids are of the straight-chain saturated and monounsaturated types with hexadecanoic and octadecenoic (Δ9) acids predominating.
The G plus C content of DNA is 33.6 mol% as determined by melting temperature.
Isolated from faeces and water.
The type strain is NCDO 2497 (= M-29C).
Other reference collection strains include NCDO 2498 (=M-40D) and NCDO 2499 (= M-128F).
Description of the type strain
In most respects the characteristics of the type strain corresponds to that of the species.
Acid is not produced from glycerol, α-methyl-D-glucoside, sorbitol, sucrose and D-turanose.
β-Galactosidase is produced.
Arginine dehydrolase and pyrrolidonylarylamidase negative.
